token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : vault_keys . clone () , to : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () }) . with_signer (& [& [b"shared_seed" , & [bump]]]) , amount ,) ? ;
